Trajectory data

Set of functions to define and subset trajectories

defineTrajectories()
Trajectory definition
subsetTrajectories()
Trajectory subsetting

Trajectory metrics

Set of functions to calculate trajectory metrics

trajectoryLengths() trajectoryLengths2D() trajectorySpeeds() trajectorySpeeds2D() trajectoryAngles() trajectoryAngles2D() trajectoryDirectionality() trajectoryInternalVariation() trajectoryMetrics() trajectoryWindowMetrics()
Trajectory metrics

Trajectory comparison

Set of functions to compare trajectories

trajectoryProjection()
Trajectory projection
segmentDistances() trajectoryDistances() trajectoryConvergence() trajectoryShifts()
Trajectory comparison
dynamicVariation() variationDecomposition()
Dynamic variation and variation decomposition

Ecological Quality Assessment

Set of functions to determine the membership to state/trajectory envelopes

trajectoryEnvelopeVariability() stateEnvelopeVariability() compareToTrajectoryEnvelope() compareToStateEnvelope()
Ecological quality assessment
